name: prAiProvider
description: Adds AI Comment to Pull Requests in Azure DevOps
author: Byte Insights

inputs.name: useAIGeneration
inputs.label: Generate comment using AI
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the comment will be generated using the selected AI provider.

inputs.name: aiProvider
inputs.label: AI Provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AI provider to use for generating comments.

inputs.name: maxFileSizeInLines
inputs.label: Max File Size (Lines)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of lines to include from each file. Files larger than this will be truncated to avoid overwhelming the AI model.

inputs.name: modelName
inputs.label: Model Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the model name to use (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus, gemini-pro)

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key for the selected provider. For security, use pipeline variables.

inputs.name: azureApiEndpoint
inputs.label: Azure API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom API endpoint URL for Azure OpenAI

inputs.name: ollamaApiEndpoint
inputs.label: Ollama API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: API endpoint URL for Ollama (default: http://localhost:11434)

inputs.name: codingStandardsFile
inputs.label: Coding Standards File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a markdown file containing coding standards to be used as guidelines for the AI when generating comments.

inputs.name: promptTemplate
inputs.label: Prompt Template
inputs.defaultValue:
Review the following code file and provide constructive feedback:

{diff}
inputs.helpMarkDown: Template for the AI prompt. Use {diff} as a placeholder for the complete file content (despite the name, it will contain the entire file). Use {standards} to include coding standards.

inputs.name: maxTokens
inputs.label: Max Tokens
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of tokens for the AI response

inputs.name: temperature
inputs.label: Temperature
inputs.helpMarkDown: Controls randomness in the AI response (0.0-1.0)

inputs.name: comment
inputs.label: Comment text. Markdown supported.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a comment to be added on pull request. Not required if using AI generation.

inputs.name: active
inputs.label: Active
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the comment will be added as active. Otherwise, it will be added as a closed comment.

inputs.name: addCommentOnlyOnce
inputs.label: Add comment only once
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, new comment won't be added if the comment already exists even if content does not match.

inputs.name: updatePreviousComment
inputs.label: Update previous comment
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the comment will be updated if it already exists.

inputs.name: markdownFile
inputs.label: Markdown file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a markdown file. If specified, the content of the file will be used as comment text.

inputs.name: pullRequestId
inputs.label: Pull Request ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add comment to this pull request. If not specified, the comment will be added to the current pull request. Required if repositoryId is specified.

inputs.name: repositoryId
inputs.label: Pull Request Repository ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add comment to pull request in this repository. If not specified, the comment will be added to the current repository.
